# Laravel + Vue Starter Kit - LLM Context

This is a Laravel + Vue.js starter kit using Inertia.js for building modern single-page applications.

## Tech Stack
- **Backend**: Laravel (PHP framework)
- **Frontend**: Vue 3 with Composition API
- **Build Tool**: Vite
- **CSS**: Tailwind CSS 4.x
- **Components**: shadcn-vue (Radix UI for Vue)
- **UI Icons**: Lucide Vue Next
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **State Management**: Vue Composition API with Inertia.js
- **Authentication**: Laravel Fortify (with 2FA support)

## Project Structure
- `app/` - Laravel application code (Models, Controllers, etc.)
- `resources/js/` - Vue.js frontend code
- `resources/js/pages/` - Inertia.js pages
- `resources/js/components/` - Vue components
- `resources/js/components/ui/` - shadcn-vue UI components
- `resources/js/layouts/` - Layout components
- `resources/js/composables/` - Vue composables
- `resources/css/` - Stylesheets
- `routes/` - Laravel route definitions
- `config/` - Laravel configuration files

## Key Features
- Server-side rendering (SSR) with Inertia.js
- Dark/light mode theming
- Two-factor authentication
- Modern Vue 3 + TypeScript development
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Component library with shadcn-vue

## Development Commands
- `npm run dev` - Start development server
- `npm run build` - Build for production
- `npm run lint` - Run ESLint
- `npm run format` - Format code with Prettier
- `composer install` - Install PHP dependencies
- `php artisan serve` - Start Laravel development server

## Architecture Notes
- Uses Inertia.js for seamless SPA experience with Laravel backend
- Vue components are located in resources/js/components/
- Pages are automatically registered via Inertia's page resolver
- Authentication handled by Laravel Fortify
- UI components follow shadcn-vue patterns

## Code Style
- TypeScript for type safety
- Vue 3 Composition API
- ESLint + Prettier for code formatting
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Single File Components (.vue files)

## Testing
- PHPUnit for backend testing
- No frontend testing framework currently configured
